text: Domenico De Simone (31 May 1926 – 11 June 2019) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party (PCI). He served as a Senator from 1976 to 1979. He was then elected to the Chamber of Deputies, serving from 1979 to 1983. De Simone was born in Torremaggiore and was the town's mayor between 1960 and 1976. De Simone died on 11 June 2019 in Torremaggiore, at the age of 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * Domenico De Simone – Chamber of Deputies profile Category:1926 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian communist politicians Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Apulia
title: Domenico De Simone
